data.eml:eml: Review of the mirine plant bug genus Eurystylus Stål from Japan and Taiwan (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Miridae: Mirinae), with descriptions of two new species, a new synonymy and a new combination

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yasunaga, Tomohide, Nakatani, Yukinobu, Chérot, Frédéric (2017): Review of the mirine plant bug genus Eurystylus Stål from Japan and Taiwan (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Miridae: Mirinae), with descriptions of two new species, a new synonymy and a new combination. Zootaxa 4227 (3): 301-324, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4227.3.1
